text: Bizir me amaga dagɨaba isir igharaziba uaghan iti, adar kara, sinamon ko, apir iriziba ko, pauran mughuriar aghuim gamim ko, grisɨn igharagha garir mughuriar aghuiba zuiba ko, sandan aghuim ko, wain ko, wel ko, plauan aghuim ko witba; men bulmakauba ko, sipsipba ko hoziaba ko dar karisba ko, pura ingangarir gumazamizir kɨniba, me dagɨaba bagha men ikɨrɨmɨriba amadi. Bizir kaba bar, gumazamizir dagh ivezamiba puvatɨ.
